channel.title: How to portfoward without a router
channel.description: I just got rid of Verizon so now we have optimum. We dont have a router but we have the modem that optimum gave us so how do i port forward with that? :|

item.title: How to portfoward without a router
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:373539”][quote author=coolman555 link=topic=469549.msg3435387#msg3435387 date=1292717557]

If you don’t have a router, you don’t need to port forward.

Well if i dont need to portfoward then what do i do?
[/quote]

Open the port on your firewall, inbound rules.

download utorrent

open it
go to preferences
and for port type in: 43594

then close u torrent completely, gratz, you are now portforwarded

If you don’t know what you’re talking about, don’t post.[/quote]

i do know what I am talkinga bout, i did exactly that and it worked for me…

Read full topic
item.source: How to portfoward without a router

item.title: How to portfoward without a router
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“coolman555, post:4, topic:373539”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=469549.msg3433958#msg3433958 date=1292596104]
If you don’t have a router, you don’t need to port forward.
[/quote]

Well if i dont need to portfoward then what do i do?[/quote]

Open the port on your firewall, inbound rules.

[quote=“brandonscarinfo, post:5, topic:373539”]download utorrent

open it
go to preferences
and for port type in: 43594

then close u torrent completely, gratz, you are now portforwarded :)[/quote]
If you don’t know what you’re talking about, don’t post.

Read full topic
